section.title: Timing
section.p: This method must be called after the camera is started (e.g., by calling or ).
This method must be called after the camera is started (e.g., by calling or ).
This method must be called after the camera starts (e.g., by calling or ).

section.title: Related Callbacks
section.p:
After this method is successfully called, the SDK triggers the callback to report face detection information:
Size of the captured image
Position of the face in the view
Distance of the face from the device screen

After calling this method successfully, the SDK triggers the callback to report face detection information:
Size of the image captured by the camera
Position of the face in the view
Distance of the face from the device screen

After successfully calling this method, the SDK triggers the callback to report face detection information:
The size of the image captured by the camera
The position of the face in the view
The distance of the face from the device screen

plentry.pd:
Whether to enable face detection:
: Enable face detection.
: (Default) Disable face detection.

Whether to enable face detection:
: Enables face detection.
: (Default) Disables face detection.

Whether to enable face detection:
: Enable face detection.
: (Default) Disable face detection.

section.title: Return Values

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
